title: A Thrilling Adventure at the Theme Park
story: This place is so cool. It is, Linda. I love it here. What do you want to do? How about a roller coaster?  Aren't those scary. A little bit, but they are safe. Okay. How about that one? Yes. That one is fun!
summary: Join Linda and her friend on a thrilling adventure at the theme park, where they experience the excitement of riding a roller coaster.
image: An image of Linda and her friend strapped into a roller coaster, with their hands in the air and big smiles on their faces.
